data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Computer software, or simply software, is a collection of computer programs and related data that provides instructions telling a computer what to do. It ____ computers ____ perform a ____ variety ____ tasks. Software ____ convert ____ information ____ digital ____ analog ____ for ____ on ____ or ____. It ____ computers ____ perform ____ and ____ decisions ____ on ____ input ____. Software ____ facilitates error-free ____ speedier ____ among ____ and ____ people ____ computers. Computer software may be installed in a computer's memory, on a storage device such as a disk or CD-ROM, or on a portable storage device such as a flash drive.

data.answer: 计算机软件，或简称软件，是计算机程序和相关数据的集合，提供指令告诉计算机该做什么。它使计算机能够执行各种各样的任务。软件程序将信息从数字转换为模拟形式，以便在显示器或扬声器上显示。它允许计算机根据输入数据执行计算和许多决策。软件还促进人与人之间以及人与计算机之间无错误和更快的交流。计算机软件可以安装在计算机的存储器、磁盘或CD-ROM等存储设备或u盘等便携式存储设备上。
